text: Sometimes a company asks a great question on Facebook, and wtf, I answer it. Like this one. They asked us to name a concert that totally blew your mind. Here's what I wrote. "Beach Boys as the surprise guest act with the Dead at the Fillmore East in 1971. When they were setting up no one knew who they were, they had grown their hair, turned into hippies. Then they played a hit, Heroes and Villains, and the place came apart."
